name: Y-Warm
description: Y-Warm, by Beijing Matrix Technologies, is an ultra-light, eco-friendly insulation with superior thermal efficiency. Thin and flexible, it suits apparel, footwear, and industry while offering moisture permeability, quick-drying, and antibacterial properties. With international patents, it significantly reduces carbon footprint.

1.title: Ultra-Light and Thin Design
1.subtitle: Y-Warm provides superior insulation with minimal weight and thickness, enhancing comfort and wearability.

2.title: Eco-Friendly and Sustainable
2.subtitle: Reduces resource consumption by 75% and minimizes carbon footprint, promoting environmental responsibility

3.title: Versatile & Durable
3.subtitle: Offers moisture permeability, quick-drying, and antibacterial properties, making it ideal for various applications like apparel and footwear.

shortdescription: Ultra-light, eco-friendly insulation with thermal and antibacterial properties.
